description: This contract involves multiple project management tasks necessary for the construction and development of the parliamentary precinct campus. Call-ups against this standing offer will be made for the provision of Construction Management (CM) Services on an ongoing basis for multiple projects managed concurrently. For the sake of Construction advice (CA) services time and material need to be requested.
tags: More convenience provided to existing data
full_summary:
## Construction Management Services for Parliamentary Precinct Campus Program

### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4269417708
* **Publication Date**: October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 4, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Reference Number**: WS4269417708-Doc4269450776 (amended 3 times)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Mike Stirling, [mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Services Required

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires a Standing Offer for Construction Management Services for the Parliamentary Precinct Campus Program. This Standing Offer will be used for multiple projects in the Parliamentary Precinct, downtown Ottawa, with a construction cost not exceeding $14 million Hull Scale of Orders/Terms of Trading for this Standing Offer will be described in the subsequent procurement process.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* ** Lowest Cost-per-Point**: The winning offer will be selected based on the lowest cost-per-point

### Other Information

* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Bidding Method**: Open bidding
* **Language**: The tender will be conducted in English and French
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract may be subject to various trade agreements, including Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), etc.
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17798673?extsite=MTc3OTg2NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17798673?extsite=MTc3OTg2NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (available in English and French)

Note: I
